name: The HellKeeper Boss
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!!

Boss Fight's Trailer

An intense boss fight against the gate keeper of Hell! Do you think you could beat it?

This is an action packed, 1 versus 1 fight against you, a fallen angel, and the Hell Keeper for your escape. Your objective is to kill him and finally escape, however he will not go down without a fight! With 3 very different phases and 5 very different attacks, it makes for an intense fight!

This boss is meant to be difficult! Will take multiple tries!

I hope you enjoy! I literally made this in 3 days, and it was very fun to make! Might add on to it if it does well, but for now this is it! Thank you for visiting and playing the game!

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!!
